description: A delicious take on classic duck pancake – Try these roast chicken pancakes with crunchy veggies and crispy garlic and shallots. A real crowd pleaser and easy and quick to prepare.
name: Shredded BBQ Chicken Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125g MasterFoods Barbeque Sauce (save 0.25 g for serving)
1 cucumber, cut into long sticks (discard the middle)
4 spring onions, trimmed and cut into 4cm pieces and sliced lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Place spring onions in iced water and set aside
Reheat Roast Chicken as per instructions
Cut chicken into 6 pieces and thinly slice the breast and shred the remaining chicken
Stir through 50g of MasterFoodsTM Barbeque Sauce (don’t be shy to use more!)

Warm up the wraps and assemble by spooning 1 tsp. of MasterFoodsTM Barbeque Sauce to the wrap if you’d like more sauce, place some chicken on one side, sprinkle sesame seeds, add cucumber strips and a few spring onions, crispy garlic and shallots. Tuck in and enjoy!
